Table: model_run

A model run associates a model with a scenario and a project.

model_run Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
identifier character varying PRIMARY KEY

A unique identifier for this model run.
doi character varying UNIQUE

A digital object identifier.
model.identifier model_identifier character varying UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL

The model.
scenario.identifier scenario_identifier character varying UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL

The scenario.
spatial_resolution character varying UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL

The spatialr resolution of this run.
range_start date UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL

The start of time range convered by this model
range_end date UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL

The end of time range convered by this model
sequence integer UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL DEFAULT 1

An index distinguishing this run from other runs with similar parameters.
sequence_description character varying

A description of how this run differs from others with similar parameters.
activity.identifier activity_identifier character varying

An activity associated with this model run.
project.identifier project_identifier character varying

A project associated with this model.
time_resolution interval

The temporal resolution of this run.

 

model_run Constraints
Name Constraint
model_run_identifier_check CHECK (((identifier)::text ~ similar_escape('[a-z0-9_-]+'::text, NULL::text)))
